resources.string: Notify when a friend is nearby
Notify when an event starts soon
You have no internet connection. SamePage requires working connection to launch.\nPlease check if there is working connection and try again.

No location is available. This may be due to the following reasons: 
1. You have turned off the Location availability
2. You have allowed GPS-only and you are in an indoor setting 

While SamePage would work without location information, you may not be able to access full features of the app. Please check your location settings and try again, or proceed with the application.
